description: Flexible event venue very suitable for corporate DND's, corporate function, birthday, parties, weddings etc. Inquire for more details.

Grissini is a contemporary Italian grill restaurant specialising in premium meats and seafood prepared in a unique oven which combines a grill and oven in one, along with pasta, pizzas and classic favourites with a twist.
Host your event today with options for halal food in a flexible event space/restaurant today.

Inspired by the contemporary fusion cuisine, we aim to delight your palette and bring to you an experiential dining experience. Each dish is specially curated to treat our customers to a gastronomic experience and delight your taste buds. 
Located along Albert Street, we provide buffet services (both halal and non-halal), western course meal dining, as well as canape and high tea catering services.

A one-of-a-kind billiard cafe & bar that is design-focused and specially equiped to host a variety of events, from small family gatherings of just 10 persons in our sectioned bar space, to  birthday parties, company team building and even an informal company meeting appointment.

Thirsty4balls is able to offer you an extremely unique and multi-usage venue with a trendy yet comfortable ambience to promote interest, enjoyment and comfort for any social and meeting appointments.

All our billiard tables can be converted to dining and board meeting tables. We have billiard games, multiple board games and a ball-pit Jacuzzi for social events to keep everyone entertained, as well as a projector screen for meeting groups or if you just want to show your personal montage on a special day.

For small meeting groups, you can order from our in-house menu that features a variety of beer/cider collection or the full list of coffee/tea/soda drinks.

Charges:
~~~~
Single Table sectioned-area for 5 to 15 persons, can be blocked off from just $50 (3 hours before 6pm) and $60 (3 hours after 6pm), with a minimum spend on in-house beers & drinks (to be quoted).
~~~~
Main area for >30 persons, $80/hr before 6pm and $95/hr after 6pm. Minimum of 3 hours per booking, with a minimum spend on in-house beers & drinks (to be quoted). Main area includes 4 Billiard Tables, Cafe Seating Area and Ball Pit Jacuzzi.
~~~~
Cafe Seating and Ball Pit section for 10 to 15 persons, $25/hr before 6pm and $35/hr after 6pm (3 hours minimum), with a minimum spend on in-house beers & drinks (to be quoted). 
~~~~
Bookings after 10pm will have an addition charge of $45 per hour.
~~~~
External catering to be arranged by organizers. A cover & cleaning charge of $100 is applicable.

Alter Ego is a beautiful event space which can cater to corporate events, birthdays and more.

Situated on Esplanade’s waterfront, Alter Ego by A Poke Theory is a sweet spot to knock back craft beers under the stars at their Alfresco area adorned in warm festoon lights. Sit at their Waterfront Alfresco for an unrivalled view of the Marina Bay, with nightly performances at Esplanade’s Outdoor Amphitheatre, or head indoors to be with a buzzing crowd. Edgy, underground and an easy go-to for their famous poke bowls or night’s post-work drinks — it’s all about unleashing your alter ego in an uninterrupted space. A mix of slate grey concretes, distressed metals and warm woods in the day, transforming into a mysterious, hidden find by night complete with red neon, an artsy mural wall and underground beats — Alter Ego’s versatile character makes it the perfect hideout for intimate events or corporate functions by the idyllic Singapore river.

Looking for an event space? Tucked away in a tranquil corner on Level 3 of the National Library, OTC Cafe is the perfect venue for your next private event, birthday bash, baby shower, corporate workshop, seminar, movie night and more!.

Whether it is for an intimate group gathering of 10-20pax or for a corporate function that needs to host more than 200pax, OTC Cafe is able to accommodate to your needs! We understand that every event is different and we will be happy to discuss and tailor a suitable package for you.

OTC café also offers catering services for those who are holding seminars or meetings within National Library.

We offer food catering for lunch, dinner or cocktail reception, venue booking, corporate packages, birthday packages, available foyer space and function rooms and free wifi.

PROMOTION:

Spend S$2400 and above on the event booking at Cali and we will give S$300 cash dining voucher to use at any of the Cali Outlet.

Thank you for considering our venue for your special event. We understand this day is important and we are honored that you have considered us to be a part of the event. When you book with us, there is NO venue charge, if you use our food and beverages.

How Our Menus Works
For any private dining party of 10 or more guests, we will work with you to create a personalized set menu for your event. Please see sample banquet menus enclosed designed to create a special culinary experience. Vegetarian options are always available. Please let us know your preferred requirements and we will do our best to accommodate your special needs.

Beverage
All beverages are based on consumption. We have an extensive wine list and a full bar and handcrafted cocktails, specially chosen to pair with food.

Audio / Visual Needs
Arrangements for audio/visual equipment can be made in advance.

Decorations
We allow to decor the cafe in your own way if you wish. You are allowed to bring your own cake and dessert station.

Private Function Room
Private rooms are available for your special events. Please email on events@cali.sg for more information.

Deposits and Cancellations 
A deposit S$500++ is required to hold your reservation; the deposit is then applied to your bill at the completion of your event. Payments can be made at the below mention bank account or at the cafe by AMEX, MASTER, VISA, CHEQUE or CASH.

Perfect Venue for Events 
Cali @ Rochester & Cali @ Changi both outlets are Located inside the Park Avenue Hotel and Suites Rochester & Changi, with ample parking space at the basement car park, is equipped with a full service bar and enough space for your next reception, birthday party, baby shower, luncheons, corporate event, cocktail party or gallery opening. We are pleased to offer a wide variety of private dining, event and catering services.

We look forward to working with you to make your event a wonderfully memorable day. Please let us know if you have any additional questions.

“Creating Moments”

The Malt Room at McGettigan’s Clarke Quay is the perfect venue. From product launches and corporate gatherings to that special birthday celebration, we will work closely with you to create the perfect package for your occasion. Key features of the Malt Room include a unique and completely private event and party venue in a central location in Singapore.

With a mix of set up styles available for seated or cocktail events,  a private bar, an extensive range of beverage options including a rare Whiskey and Scotch collection, and an excellent range of menus and catering options from our onsite chefs. The venue is also equipped with modern audio and visual facilities.

Whatever the event, you will be in great hands, with a dedicated event planner on hand to assist with all of your requirements.

**PROMOTION - For groups of 50pax or more receive a 10% discount off the price of the food for all January 2019 bookings made through December 2018. Use promo code - MCGSJAN10

Brand New Vibrant Event Space. CoSpace Park is a cozy and modern fitted space able to cater to all your needs. It flexible and fitted with an in-house cafe. Our Arena Space can be used for any occasions from private events, town halls, gatherings, private events, product launch, and more.

CoSpace Park is built in at the heart of Science Park 2. Surrounded by lush greenery, we aim to provide the best environment for innovation and meaningful relationships to occur.

Nearby we also have private offices and hot desking to offer individuals or corporates that want to build something that can make a difference.

Hold your talks, team brainstorming workshops and more at the MOX auditorium. Designed around a playful and liberating perspective, the auditorium seats about 50 pax with standing room for up to 60 people. Comes with projector, basic sound system, and a variety of hammocks thoughtfully sponsored by our partner, Airmocks. Complimentary access to the pantry available on request.

MOX is Singapore’s first and largest independent design resource workspace that aims to empower the local creative community by providing makers, artists and designers with a home to work and co- exist. Situated within the first heritage town, Katong, MOX is the anchor tenant of a 4-storey building, Katong Point. Designed for the makers, this resource centre will include specialty tools and programmes to facilitate creative collaborations.

Invade is a creative retail space activation and events management company founded in 2010. Known for its innovative retail concepts, Invade manages pop-up retail stores, runs some of the largest flea markets, and also operates a real-time retail booking system that allows businesses to rent and list spaces in an efficient manner in Singapore. Invade is also the managing partner of the Artbox Asia tour, bringing the best of creative markets to the region with each city’s installation infused with the local flavour.

Invade is part of iFashion, a leading venture platform company focused on investing and acquiring fashion and lifestyle e-commerce ventures based in Southeast Asia.

A space for all to hang out for a small intimate but exciting celebration! Be it Birthday Parties, Bachelorette Parties, Bridal Shower, Baby Shower, Corporate Events, Workshops or Fitness Session and more, we can change the entire setting for you at an affordable rate starting from $350.

tagline: The Admiral at Marina at Keppel Bay
description:
Our flagship yacht, The Admiral, is a Grand Banks 52 Europa specially designed for luxurious cruising. The deluxe interior boasts finely-crafted finishings, designer fittings, expansive lounge spaces and a grand saloon that offers impressive views from helm to aft deck. The flybridge sets a lavish lounge for entertaining, with abundant seating and a large hand-made teak table specially made for sunset dining.

Whether it’s a corporate event, family get-together or chilling-out with friends, The Admiral is perfect for a day of cruising, dining and entertainment out at sea.

http://www.marinakeppelbay.com/portfolio_page/the-admiral/

Tree Lizards is beautifully nestled across botanical gardens at Dempsey Hill surrounded by huge tall trees each at least 50 years old!

Tree Lizards is a perfect venue to hold all types of events.

A large field and a great 3-tier playground make it ideal for kids parties on weekends or during holidays.

The perfect clubhouse atmosphere make it the place to hold company dinners and parties or for individuals to get together their friends and family for a birthday party, a cocktail or any other occasion.

Together with the al-fresco area, Tree Lizard Restaurant & Bar is also very suitable for solemnizations or casual gatherings.

Tree Lizard Restaurant & Bar has a modular design that allows the right room to be allocated depending on the size and type of party

Located in the heart of Katong, Parallel is proud to present our 2nd venue, Control Space. A private event space that guarantees a different experience like no other. Ever seen an event on Instagram hosted by a friend and although you want to host something similar, you don’t want it to be the same? Well, our venue guarantees that no 2 events are the same. 

Many other event spaces have fixed amenities which may not be suitable to every event. Our unique concept has the ability to transform your event to ensure that it’s one of a kind. 
- Fill up the space with chairs towards our projector to host a seminar or meeting
- Fill up the space with tables and chairs to have a casual lunch/dinner or a workshop
- Replace the chairs with a mahjong table and our enlarged Jenga to ensure your guests are always entertained
- Convert our beer pong area to a relax and chilling corner filled with cushions
- Having a kids birthday party? No problem. Kids tables and chairs can be set up with a Disney movie played on our projector!

Your 1 stop event venue that leaves your guests wanting more. An event space, where you have total control.

Amenities available
1. Sound Bar - Powered by Popsical
2. Enlarged Beer Pong
3. Enlarged Jenga
4. Wii U Console with assorted games
5. Foosball 
6. Darts
7. Mahjong (On request)
8. Projector (Can be plugged to a Laptop)
9. 7 Seater Sofa 
10. Counter table with bar stools
11. Private toilet

Control Space is suitable for:

-4 hours for 500 SGD is the minimum (Mon-Thurs)

Occupying the almost 200-year-old building that was Singapore’s first Parliament House, The Arts House has been offering its audiences a broad range of arts and culture programmes since its opening in 2004. It also plays an active role in the Singapore creative scene. Since 2011, The Arts House has been focusing on the development and promotion of literary arts, while continuing to present and support programmes and festivals that aim to give our audiences a wide and multidisciplinary experience.

Once a space where Singapore’s most important decisions were made, the former Parliamentary Chamber is the highlight of The Arts House, and is now a popular venue for musical performances, stage productions and conferences. Other venue options include a black box theatre, galleries, multi-purpose rooms, and a screening room, featuring a digital cinema projector and 7.1 Dolby surround sound.

Minimum rental of 4 hours is required.

Unlock 10% discount by using promo code ARTS10OFF on the inquiry form and submit the signed invoice to promo@venuerific.com

Perfect for hosting your corporate and board meetings. With an interactive projector screen and smart lighting controls, you will make an impression.

We also provide our set up services at your desired location according to your theme other than just at our space! Let us know and we will make it work for you at an affordable rate starting from $350 onwards!

Nestled in a cosy neighbourhood filled with architectural, cultural and historic significance, our studio at Tiong Bahru is great for inspiring and creative events, workshops and private gatherings. The light-filled space features a spacious lounge area with adjoining room, dining area and kitchen.

We are a stone’s throw away from the Tiong Bahru Market and Tiong Bahru MRT station. Ample parking spaces are also available behind the studio for those who are driving.

The venue is also equipped with all sort of amenities such as projectors, poker table, board games and much more.  If you’re looking for something unique and different, Vertex Uno is the space for you.

A unique concept situated in the heart of Dempsey Hill.  Set in a very rustic, high ceiling colonial space with elements of retail, cheese room, bakery and also includes communal style tables.  Caters to large and small events ( food formats include canapes, breakfast, lunch, dinners, cheese grazing tables, High tea and Carvery).  Our team can curate something for any occasion.

Set in an iconic heritage building that is SO Sofitel Singapore, the rooftop pool bar 1927 offers guests a luxurious urban oasis set in the heart of CBD with its glitzy cocktails and ritzy decor. Discerning epicureans can look forward to embarking on a gastronomical journey with the bar’s innovative selection of artisanal equatorial cocktails, delicately paired with tantalizing sharing platters of modern tapas and bar bites. A charismatic rooftop lounge with dashes of tropical chic elements surrounding the lush infinity-edged pool, 1927 creates an exclusive dining experience that is inviting by day, intimate by night.

Featured in the recent blockbuster hit Crazy Rich Asians, CÉ LA VI is situated on the rooftop of Marina Bay Sands Skypark and overlooks a panoramic view of the city skyline and metropolitan lights. CÉ LA VI is arguably Asia’s finest luxury lifestyle destination which has revolutionised the Singapore hospitality and entertainment industry with experiences that elevate and amplify the spirit.

Concocting drama and inspired moments out of culinary, mixology, music, culture and stunning atmosphere, CÉ LA VI is known as a legendary name for top lifestyle entertainment, celebrity sightings, and a theatre where music and dance is touted as a religion.

Our space consists of a Skybar, Restaurant and Club Lounge and caters for events from 12 pax and above, for a multitude of special occasions.  Kindly enquire with our team for more information on the space and how we can help you plan your perfect event.

Axe Factor, Located in the Bukit Timah area with a nearby MRT station, shuttle bus and flexible booking timings, brings you a space where you can engage in the primitive sport of Axe Throwing (Think darts, but bigger and better)! Our space is not only equipped with Axe throwing lanes, but dart board, popsical KTV system, and Virtual Reality games as well! There’s something for everyone. Truly the perfect space for anyone looking to host their birthdays/events/Teambuilding/Hens night/Bachelor party in the most unique venue in Singapore!

Crowning the Ocean Financial Centre, 43 storeys above bustling Collyer Quay with 270 degrees panoramic view of the Marina Bay skyline conveniently located in the heart of Singapore’s CBD.  Zafferano is a perfect venue offering an unforgettable taste of all-round Italian hospitality – beautiful food, impeccable service, enjoyed within a convivial ambience.

Zafferano offers two exclusive rooms - the Private Dining Room and the Wine Room. The Private Dining Room boasts a private entrance for discreet access, designed for a luxurious party for up to 22 guests. The Wine Room seats up to 12 guests around a long table, cocooned by racks of wine bottles, offering an elegant, embracing ambience.

Currently located centrally right next to Stadium MRT. This 1,708 seater theatre is the renowned venue for notable international acts such as Les Miserables, Cats, Chicago the Musical, Miss Saigon and Phantom of the Opera. It has housed concerts, ceremonial functions, university convocations and many more. From 1986 to 2000, the Kallang Theatre hosted the annual National Day Rally.

Former Prime Ministers, the late Lee Kuan Yew and Goh Chok Tong held their National Day Rallies at the theatre. To this day, the room used by the Prime Ministers – the “Lee Kuan Yew Room” as it is called, remains as one of the best kept rooms in the building.

The Kallang Theatre took a four year hiatus in March 2007. Before re-opening the theatre in 2011, the new management, Asia Arts & Culture Pte Ltd. invested about S$1.5 mil in renovations which included the installation of a brand new audio and lighting system.

The opening took off with the maiden local musical “Singapura - The Lion City”. Recent acts that have performed at the Kallang Theatre include Dream Theater, Mr. Big, Jayesslee, Sam Tsui and Sungha Jung to add.
The stage has a proscenium width of 15m and an area of 252 sq m. It is equipped with up-to-date lighting and sound equipment, and has an electronically operated orchestra pit. The two-levelled auditorium and backstage areas are fully air conditioned.

Other facilities within the Kallang Theatre include 10 dressing rooms, 2 large foyers VIP rooms, function rooms, Loading/unloading bay and an in-house carpark with a capacity of 200 cars lots.
It is conveniently located opposite the new Singapore Sports Hub and has the Stadium MRT Station right at its doorstep.

Artichoke is probably the least authentic Middle Eastern restaurant around. And that’s exactly how it should be. Our cozy 150-seater lecture theatre comes with adjustable lighting settings, dual LCD projector with projector screens for presentations, and AV equipment and rostrum can be set up where required. It is also wheelchair-accessible as our campus supports universal design.

Hard Rock Cafe Singapore, sporting a new sleek contemporary look, adorned a refreshed collection of memorabilia, and an all-American food favourites!

Singapore’s flagship outlet opened in February 1990 in the trendy Orchard Road area and has been rocking ever since, hosting events from the Asian Television Awards to The New Paper’s World Cup Finals’ screening.

Choose from:
The Red Carpet Room, a cozy room on the second floor with floor-to-ceiling windows. Best for meetings, seminars, solemnizations or private dinners.
The Mezzanine, an open balcony layout with a bar area, great for networking or corporate meet & greet.
The Main Floor - complete with a dance floor and a stage. Ideal for larger parties and events such as concerts, album launches and dinner and dance.

For a truly memorable affair, enjoy the lavishness of a wedding ceremony onboard The Royal Albatross. The grace and elegance of this ship provides the perfect setting for a gorgeous wedding, step into the elegant ambience of a bygone era . Relax with the gentle breeze and let the romantic atmosphere leave you and your guests feeling enthralled aboard the Royal Albatross for a dreamy waterfront wedding.

Offering gorgeous views of the South China Sea,  the ship is an exclusive and impressive alternative to conventional wedding venues which we can integrate with The Pavilion By The Sea. This idyllic harbour-front setting offers a unique alternative venue for those looking for an outdoor alfresco theme. Your guests will delight with a breathtaking sea view of the waterfront and beyond. The Pavilion offers a garden lawn area for creative set-ups or hosting of pre-wedding activities, be it an English garden themed day or a classic wedding at night under the stars embracing the cool sea breeze

The Joyden Hall is a creative space that provides the opportunity for limitless event possibilities and the materialization of innovative ideas. With retractable tiered seats, mobile stage platforms and professional theatre equipment, a variety of space configurations can be easily achieved to effectively meet all event needs.

Strategically located in the heart of Jurong with excellent connectivity to other parts of Singapore, as well as a wide range of amenities nearby, Jurong Town hall served as JTC’s first permanent headquarters from 1974 to 2000 and is key landmark that symbolises Singapore’s successful industrialisation programme during the nation-building years. Gazetted as a national monument in 2015, Jurong Town Hall now houses the Trade Association Hub, which supports a vibrant ecosystem of trade associations and chambers and plays a critical role in the next phase of Singapore’s economic development.

There following rooms are available for booking:

Hero’s is a sprawling 2,500 sq-ft saloon style venue with a fully-stocked bar, full menu (burgers, kebabs, pizzas, mixed platters and other pub grub) and live band set-up. Our unique VIP area comprises beer-tap tables where patrons can pour their own pints. Hero’s also boasts a spacious main hall as well as a comfortable al fresco area. On Fridays and Saturdays, Circular Road is closed allowing us to add street seating. External catering and events beyond regular opening hours are available upon request.

alittle tashi is a laid-back restaurant in Jalan Besar that is gently revolutionising Asian cuisine with a medley of global flavours. Perfect for communal dining, the Modern Asian Plates at alittle tashi are inspired by the diverse cultures and cuisines of the world discovered by the chef and owners during their travels. Divided into two social spaces; the Dining Room invites you to mix it up, eat with your hands, settle in and enjoy a no-frills meal, while the Laundry Room is an intimate space thoughtfully put together for drinks and bar bites. Come to alittle tashi for a glorious spread of Modern Asian plates.

Amazing venue near CBD with Modern Asian plates suitable for parties, corporate events, birthdays, solemnisation etc.

Awarded as Asia’s Leading Design Hotel and one of Singapore’s trendiest hotels, Grand Park Orchard is a lifestyle destination on Orchard Road. With its breathtaking herringbone design exterior glass façade and show-stopping media wall, our flagship property is a masterpiece in contemporary chic. Boasting a prime location in the heart of Singapore’s premier shopping and entertainment district, Grand Park Orchard lives up to its name as Singapore’s most fashionable hotel. From the designer interiors in the lobby to 308 rooms and a laidback alfresco bar with its stunning pool, you will be greeted by cutting-edge works of style meisters at every turn. The exclusive Crystal Club and personal butlers are also available to take your experience to the next level at one of the best city hotels in Singapore.

Head to the dazzling Orchard Road where an array of major shopping malls as well as lifestyle and dining options awaits at the hotel’s doorstep.

Recognize Studios is a hub that consistently provides event consultancy services and venue spaces fit for a wide array of events and activities that is backed with logistical support and the capacity to provide Food & Beverage Provisions. In addition, corporate and team building programs are also available, making Recognize Studios a one stop destination!
The venue spaces that make up Recognize Studios are highly customizable with various space configurations to best suit each event & activity. On top of that, a range of facilities and logistics are available to aid in the requirements of multiple events.
Recognize Studios is easily accessible as it is being located in the prime CBD area, and is walking distance from both Downtown MRT Station and Tanjong Pagar MRT Station.

Set against the panoramic backdrop of Singapore’s industrial waterfront, Cargo39’s 4000-square-foot warehouse boasts an industrial-chic interior with exposed ceiling trusses, gleaming chandeliers and concrete floors.

Expansive sea views and urban artwork come together to create a one-of-a-kind, quite literally “out-of-the-box” experience at Tanjong Pagar Distripark.

The sprawling space includes the Angra Wine & Spirit cellar with over 20,000 bottles and stacked barrels adding a rustic touch. At night, the marina skyline with lights from the ships and cranes against the dark ocean.

Industrial minimalism meets urban luxury to inspire creativity and innovation. From weddings and private celebrations to corporate events, product launches, fashion shows, fundraisers and photo shoots, the possibilities are endless at Cargo39.

With four different locations, Flower Field Hall, Waterview Room, Silver Leaf and The Meadow, Gardens by the Bay would certainly leave every guest with a lasting impression of the place.

Under the canopy of silver-hued Supertrees and overlooking the Dragonfly Lake, Silver Leaf offers an intimate setting for private and exclusive events. The scenic garden setting yields countless picture-perfect moments, with the iconic Flower Dome and Marina Bay skyline in the background.

The Waterview Room can be used as a standalone room for private events or to complement events taking place in the Flower Field Hall as both venues are adjoining. Be enthralled by the Marina Bay waterfront view and Bay East Garden while enjoying precious moments during your events here.

The Meadow, Singapore’s largest outdoor garden event space - boasting a standing capacity of up to 30,000 people. The panoramic view of the iconic Conservatories, Supertrees and Singapore’s downtown cityscape provides a stunning backdrop for mega events and nights to remember.

Nestled within the Flower Dome, Flower Field Hall engages guests with a sensory experience. Overlooking the changing Flower Field display on one side, and a spectacular view of the Marina Bay skyline on the other, this indoor space captivates with its picturesque backdrop of perpetual spring.

Welcome to Dancing Crab, serving a mix of robust, country-style Cajun seafood and the distinctive richness of Creole cuisine. Dancing Crab is a refreshing, American counterpart to Singapore’s equally famed preferences for seafood, shellfish and rich flavors. Backed by one of Singapore’s oldest seafood restaurant leaders, TungLok Group, Dancing Crab sources their shellfish from the same vendors used at the group’s best seafood restaurants,  offering a range from Boston lobster to Dungeness crab.

New Orleans, Louisiana is known for its happy atmosphere, lively music, and high spirits. Dancing Crab brims with life, bringing the same emphasis to its colorful location at The Grandstand, welcoming its guests to eat, drink, and be merry.

Evoking the decadence of an emperor’s courtyard and seating up to 200 diners,  Kai Garden is the premier dining destination in Marina Square headed by Owner and Executive Chef Fung Chi Keung, an award-winning chef whose inimitable style and sumptuous Cantonese dishes have placed him among the elite of Chinese chefs in Singapore.

With a flexible layout including a main dining hall, a multipurpose function room and four individual private VIP rooms, Kai Garden makes an ideal venue for corporate events, special occasions, as well as business and private dining.

tagline: C Side - Coastes, Bikini Bar, Sand Bar & Flame
description:
Opening hours for various outlets are subjected to requirements of events. Additional charges may apply.

Experience the epitome of beach culture at C Side, the most authentic beach destination in Singapore. The ultimate escape from the hustle bustle of the city is right here at your doorstep. With a mix of entertainment, activities, parties, food & beverage options, C Side has something for everyone.

The ideal place for corporate functions, dinner and dance, family day, networking events, product launches, birthday parties and weddings, C Side is the most convenient beach getaway in Singapore. With panoramic views of the Siloso shoreline, C Side offers a great vantage point to take in glorious sunsets and beautiful displays of fireworks every evening.

With an expansive beach and deck space, C Side is a perfect venue for small and large scale events whilst keeping that intimate feel. At C Side, beach-lovers can truly unwind and enjoy the sun, sand, sea and good food!

C Side is a combination of five outlets, each with its own distinct vibe and concept: Coastes, Sand Bar, Bikini Bar and Flame.

Minimum Spending:
$50 per person on Weekdays
$88 per person on Weekends

Prices are subject to GST & Service Charge. For more info or choice of menus, please inquire.

Housed in a 5,000 square foot venue at the 5 Star Pan Pacific Hotel located at Marina Bay, Bang Bang draws its inspiration from the world’s top high-energy nightclubs and brings it into an intimate setting with a capacity of 400 revelers. Alongside smartly appointed furniture, fixtures, and eye-catching décor, Bang Bang will house a state-of-the-art L’Acoustics sound system as well as a 45 foot long high-resolution LED wall, bringing you experience to the next level.

The Queen & Mangosteen is more than just an average English pub in
Singapore. It is known to serve great food, underrated Pub Grub as well as
handcrafted micro-brewed beers from Archipelago, the first commercial
brewery in Singapore since 1931. This family-friendly Gourmet British Pub
also serves a selection of kids meals. Located at VivoCity, it makes a lively
pit stop in between your shopping-day-out as well as providing million dollar
views of Sentosa Island.

In the wee hours of 4th Aug 2011, we baked our first batches of muffins on the ground floor of a little yellow shophouse along Telok Ayer Street.  Today, outside of our unique range of muffins, we also offer savoury lunch/dinner items – pies, quiches and sandwiches, and a wider (and growing) range of sweet treats – tarts, cakes, scones, homemade granola, cookies. All our products – including the Turkish pide we serve our sandwiches and sliders on – are proudly baked from scratch on-site from our own unique recipes.

Our beverage menu which started off featuring our signature blend of coffee, teas, and smoothies, now offers wines from the cellars of Domaine de la Baume and a range of craft beers to take you into the night.

We have grown upwards to offer more seating. The second and mezzanine floors of our shophouse offer a hideaway amidst the bustle of the CBD.  This space which has hosted corporate events, private parties…even a few marriage proposals!… is cheerful by day – filled with natural light, and has a mellow, chilled vibe as the sun sets – a perfect spot to unwind and swap stories of the day before heading home.

Situated in a cozy corner in a row of vintage shop house along Lorong Kilat, East Manhattan Café’s nicely decorated interior with hipster rustic theme undoubtedly would bring back memories of the good old days.

Ideal for all kinds of events from Private Parties, Corporate Function, Marketing Event to Media Launch. With ample parking space next to the café and a location a little off Bukit Timah, your guest would have minimal difficulties in attending your event hosted with us.

Be charmed by its unique deco of Manhattan style picture and poster while being wowed by its artistic furniture that is full of character. Pamper the palate further with our artisan bread, usually consisting of not more than five ingredients, its texture and flavour are generally superior to that of commercial breads.

Making your event a memorable experience is important to us

Laughing Juice is an exclusive venue, suitable for private luncheons/dinners, birthday parties, gatherings and product launches. The venue is located 5 minutes from Orchard MRT and has easy access to parking.

Laughing Juice also provides private chef services and offer a range of boutique whiskeys, wines, and spirits. Celebrate your event with us and have a memorable experience.

Unlock 10% discount by using promo code LAUGH10OFF on the inquiry form and submit the signed invoice to promo@venuerific.com

Talay Thai serves authentic Thai food with an urban twist – it’s a modern, warm and avant-garde “drinking hole” where suits and food collide.

Talay Thai is set to make waves as the newest Thai tapas concept in Singapore situated at the hottest wine and dine precinct – Clarke Quay. The interior décor exudes a resounding punch of personality; the orchestrated harmony of the rustic deep red floors, electric fish scale feature walls and ornate traditional Thai displays is a sight to behold and drinking hole worth a go.

With an extensive menu of over 50 items, Talay Thai will leave you spoilt for choices. From more than 20 variety of tapas bites to unique Thai cocktail concoctions, enjoy the authentic Thai experience and take your taste buds on a flavour explosion.

Host your event at our restaurant and enjoy our delicious authentic Thai cuisines. Perfect for corporate event, networking, client dinners and birthday parties.

Cookyn Inc believes in Making Food Fun by fostering interactions amongst people, be it in a social group or a corporate department. More than just a cooking school, we understand that cooking is just part of the fun in working together to create memories that will last for a long time. We also seek to provide wholesome food for your private parties and celebrate special milestones from a full month party to a 60th Birthday bash at our venue.

Since its inception in 1971, fine dining Indian restaurant Rang Mahal at Pan Pacific Singapore represents a legacy of gastronomic excellence of over four decades in visionary culinary dedication.

Serving traditional authentic Indian food, the award winning restaurant continues to remain true to its roots with the constant push of innovation, which is presented in an exceptional menu that marries contemporary and heritage.

Complemented with impeccable service, diners can expect an extraordinary dining experience that is built upon a foundation of unwavering passion.

In the unrelenting pursuit of excellence, Rang Mahal embarked on a transformation in 2012 and reopened with an elegant and timeless look.

Awarded the esteemed Singapore Brand Prestige Award in 2009 and Singapore Tatler Best Restaurants consecutively since 2010, Rang Mahal continues to push the boundaries to provide a holistic award winning dining experience.

Owned by Singapore-based Hind Group, Rang Mahal Restaurants presents authentic traditional Indian fare in modern, minimalistic forms and is known for its contemporary and stylish interiors.

The Polliwogs @ Suntec City offers seriously FUN memories in a safe and hygienic environment. Our adventurous attractions and diverse programs facilitate social interactions between families and encourage the fostering of new friendships. FUN Ambassadors are always ready to organize exciting activities and unforgettable celebrations for that special day in every child and parents’ lives.

Indulge in delicious healthy food and snacks; meet The Polliwogians – Rocky, Larry, Poco and Bobby; throw a themed birthday party; get creative with our weekly activities; and much much more.

Featuring state of the art play equipment, custom built to promote parent-child bonding through multi-sensory play, The Polliwogs = Serious Fun.

Each centre also offers a dedicated play arena for toddlers that encourages the development of fine motor skills, as well as a comfortable lounge area with free wireless network for the adults. The fun never stops at The Polliwogs.
OSG-Our Simple Goodness is a multi-cuisine live music bar at Suntec City with a mission of spreading LOVE through Our Simple act of Goodness.
A luxury yacht with full facilities onboard. Offers a memorable alternative venue for all types of function.

TongKang Riverboat Dining at Clarke Quay presents experiential dining on the last surviving pair of tongkangs (light boats for carrying goods) in Singapore. The first of these two treasured tongkangs or Bar Boat houses a bar, perfect for after-work drinks or corporate parties.

The second boat or Restaurant Boat is where diners will enjoy exquisite cuisine aboard this historic vessel. That’s not all, you can entertain your business associates at a private meal or hold your theme parties and soiree for your weddings and stag nights. The view of the sunset and gentle breeze completes the memorable experience.

Al Forno is one of the oldest restaurant in Singapore since 1995 which specializes in Italian food and pizzeria. 
Our restaurant is famous for the delicious pizzas and the pasta dishes. This venue is available for corporate dinners, gatherings, birthdays and other events.

A unique dining concept from Open Door Policy, where the rustic flavours of Southeast Asia are celebrated in the signature refinement of Ryan Clift from Tippling Club.

Immersed in the region’s culture and inspired by its culinary tastes, Clift’s culinary team headed up by Chef Miller Mai delivers modern interpretations of southeast Asian cuisine paired with specially handcrafted Asian cocktails and boutique wines.

Tuck in to share plates of familiar flavours executed by way of the Western influence and progressive techniques, ideally experienced via the Feed Us menu – the best way to get acquainted with Ding Dong.

Imagine hosting your intimate private event at a luxury yacht. The Ferretti 630 represents a new challenge for the experienced team made by Zuccon International Project Studio and the Engineering Division of Ferretti Yachts which designed a superb yacht incomparable for space and brightness. The external shape has been made very aggressive thanks to a new spherical unique window that goes from the stern to the bow. Inside a 360 degrees view offers the feeling of being into an open space yacht. Many interior solutions has been used to enlarge the space for guests offering a unique comfort. The master cabin presents an open view window, another big effort in terms of space optimization which made the 630 a yacht more similar to the bigger boats of the Ferretti Yachts range.

Brand new to the Singapore charter scene and managed by Lloyd Marine, this clipper-style, 45-foot motor yacht is 45 is ideal for fishing trips or entertaining up to 12 guests. Fully equipped with sound system, outdoor BBQ, dinghy with outboard, kayak/paddleboard, snorkelling and fishing equipment, she has everything you need for an exhilarating day out on the water.

Ideal for a weekend soirée or corporate getaway with Sevens.Possess the ultimate luxurious motor yachts for short charters in Singapore to Nongsa Point Marina & Resort, and Montigo Resorts Nongsa within the island of Batam.

An impressive 50-footer, Sgyacht is fresh off the drawing boards of the BMW design team. It boasts a luxurious cherry wood salon interior with sleek leather lounges. Its generous aft deck features a roomy lounge that seats 13 adults. And its large cockpit is great for a variety of watersports.

You can expect the best of speed and adventure.The latest inclusion to Sgyacht’s fleet, the winner of the 2005 cruiser of the year, this Riviera M400 sports cruiser is the perfect combination of speed, style and sensuality. Sevens is truly an embodiment of Riviera heritage. By this we mean that all familiar and reassuring aspects of Riviera boatbuilding DNA; the purposeful lines, hefty scantlings, the solid feel in a seaway, spacious layout and Euro style luxurious décor.

Earl of Hindh is the brainchild of a team of enterprising expat Indian entrepreneurs. EOH is our quest of reinvigorating the inimitable Indian disposition that seeks to balance materialistic achievement and glory on the one hand and philosophical and cultural refinement on the other. Indians do not see any contradictions in both these pursuits. Our mission is to bring to the world the finest of Indian cuisine. However, Indian cuisine is not just about food. It is a holistic experience that is deeply embedded in our rich social traditions. For thousands of years Indians have experimented with and perfected hospitality in their unique way. We aim to bring the opulence, once enjoyed by the royalty of India, to those who have earned their right to it in modern times.

Sen of Japan is a casual dining Japanese restaurant and bar. Our dishes are designed by Chef
Nakano Hiromi, who used to head the famous NOBU at the Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Las
Vegas. Outfitted with blond wood bar counters and floor-to-ceiling windows, the unrivaled
views are coupled with fresh and expertly prepared dishes.

With great scenic views of the Singapore Skyline and the Promenade, your event is set to be a
memorable one at Sen of Japan.

Owned by Lloyd Marine, this beautiful Lagoon 400 sailing catamaran is ideal for intimate gatherings of up to 18 people. Drop anchor in the sheltered bays of Singapore Southern Islands and enjoy a BBQ on deck, kayaking and paddle-boarding by day or entertain in style on a sunset cruise, with the stunning Singapore skyline as your backdrop.

Residing at the swanky Purvis Street, Gunther’s bring about sophisticated French fare to the chic fine dining scene. The meticulously-crafted restaurant, whose name yields the personality of Gunther himself, the man behind this establishment, depicts the realization of a dream that he has over the years - that is a place to call his home.

“Opening Gunther’s is not just a dream come true, it’s the realisation of a home — my home. This is where I devise and visualise my creations. This is where I could finally present cuisines that I truly call my own.”  - Chef Gunther Hubreschen

The Amethyst was developed to set a new standard as the state-of-the-art, pure-bred Aquila 48 Power Catamaran1 with a perfect balance between luxurious comfort and performance.

The main deck offers extended spaces for living large, with beautiful panoramic views and access to both forward and aft covered cockpit seating areas. Inside, comfortable saloon seating ensures leisurely dining and entertainment. The galley is ergonomically designed with the most modern of appliances, and all the cabins are well-lit thanks to their panoramic windows and offer spacious en-suite bathrooms and showers stalls.

Pleasing modern lines set the Amethyst in a league of her own and moving around this boat is a breeze for all. Access to the flybridge from one of five convenient stairways – the interior salon, or the innovative forward and aft secure stairways. A large entertainment and dining area on the flybridge with barbecue with wet bar.

On the main deck, outside shaded areas in the front and rear ensure leisurely relaxation on every level. Everywhere you look on board the Amethyst, you will find quality without compromise.

Venuerific Special Promotion: Put code vrific2017 on inquiry form and claim $50 off your booking.

We know that good times only begin in the presence of great food and amazing company.

At On the table, we will help you with the former and all you need to do is to bring in your favourite family and friends for a grand celebration! We take pride in serving up the most delicious comfort fare because we believe that you deserve only the best from us. Our interior exudes a raw industrial vibe, yet retains a cozy and comfortable atmosphere perfect for any form of gatherings. With a public car park and Pasir Panjang MRT station just right at our doorstep, your guests will have no difficulties locating the café at all.

We welcome birthdays, weddings, corporate and just about any sort of celebration, so drop us an enquiry today!

Located in the midst of CHIJMES’ lush garden setting, Privé is an oasis of relaxation for urbanites who are looking for a little respite from the hustle and bustle of the city. The casual atmosphere and unassuming design makes you almost feel like you are stepping into someone’s backyard and immediately puts you in the mood for some socialising over good food and drinks. Take in the lush greenery from the surrounding courtyard and immerse yourself in the old-world charm as you savour a fuss-free meal under the cool shade of the many trees or nurse a refreshing mojito under a blanket of stars. Here, you’ll always find a space to call your own.

FYR Cycene Ond Drinc (pronounced as FIRE Kitchen and Drink) is a casual dining restaurant and bar located at 19, Boon Tat Street. Against the backdrop of Chinatown’s historic allure, FYR promises an intriguing experience that harks back to a simpler time. It’s interior is a decidedly rugged vibe, flavoured by an overhanging vintage chandelier, sepia-hued wall mural and hardwood benches. Even its moniker is as old as time – it is the etymology of fire, the chiefest of elements in cooking.

Juxtaposing this intricate tapestry of olden-day charm is FYR’s modern European-style cuisines. Exotic herbs and spices of Southeast Asia go into every dish, intensifying the taste. All of FYR’s cuisine and dishes are whipped up using the Josper Charcoal Oven. The chefs of FYR use lychee wood, which gives the dishes a wonderful smoky note that is tinged with sweetness.

FYR is helmed by a management team and key service staff who collectively have more than 15 years of experience.

Whether you are a wine connoisseur or just the occasional wine lover, at Napoleon you will be able to enjoy wines at your pace and comfort, in a cosy atmosphere. Its innovative concept, revolving around pairing and sharing, offers the chance to taste 32 European wines by the glass and pair them with the Singaporean chef’s interpretation of Southern European casual cuisine. Discover our food and wine matching suggestions specially created around defined categories of wines. Our dedicated team will assist you in finding the flavour that best suits you.

tagline: Baja Fresh Mexican Grill - Event Space
description:
Nestled in the heart of the city – Baja Fresh Mexican Grill offers two event spaces for your perfect Mexican fiesta. Party with probably the best Mexican cuisine in town with pitchers of frozen margaritas, sangrias and draft beer.

Our first space is a chic location at The Sail, right in the middle of CBD –A perfect location for post office parties and weekend parties, birthdays and baby showers. A comfortable space for  up to 40 – 50 people. 
Minimum spend of $1,500 for exclusive booking / $500 for a partial booking (15 – 20 people)

Our second spot is at Baja Fresh Mexican Grill @ Rendezvous Hotel. A better location for larger parties of 60 - 80 people. Located conveniently at Bras Basah, near Dhoby Ghaut. 
Minimum spend of $2,500 for exclusive booking / $1500 for a partial booking (30 – 40 people)

An established and popular Italian dining destination which continues to dish out the finest in contemporary cucina italiana (Italian cuisine). Upon entering Senso, diners will be enthralled by the understated elegance and sophistication of this 156-seater establishment that occupies five heritage shophouses.

BIN 38 - the ultimate experience in private dining.

Located on level 2, the exclusive three-part space comprises of Chef-Owner Ryan Clift’s state-of-the-art R&D test kitchen, a 34-seater cocktail lounge and an intimate 12-seater dining area – encapsulating the full Tippling Club experience in a private space. With a standing capacity of up to 60 pax, BIN 38 is the perfect venue for networking, presentations, product launches, VIP registrations, press conferences, birthday/ festive celebrations or a dinner treat to thank your team and clients.

Every event at Tippling Club is customized and personalized regardless of size. Here, we have an award winning team (led by Chef Ryan), that can create a menu and experience tailored to our guests’ needs. With one of the most innovative kitchens and best stocked bars in Asia, we take pride in the quality and creativity of each Tippling Club event. The unique venue layout allows us to design one-of-a-kind food and cocktail master classes for you and your guests.

With influences from the Mediterranean, Miska Cafe is dedicated to provide a relaxed gathering place for friends and families, with a breathtaking view of the marina. Come and experience an authentic yet modern experience, through a creative Mediterranean menu that combines fresh products, homemade sauces and dressings, a subtle blend of spices and exotic flavours. Complement your meals or chill out evenings with a wide selection of cold draught beer, wines, margaritas, cocktails and specialty drinks that are available from the bar.

A modern-Japanese restaurant set within the centre of a heritage building overlooking Singapore’s beautiful Marina Bay waterfront, Kinki Restaurant serves up unique non-conventional Japanese dishes using the freshest ingredients and the most creative of flavour combinations – all served at the highest quality. Experience the culinary artistry in Kinki’s signature dishes like the Foie Gras and Scallop Sushi and Tai Carpaccio of thinly sliced sea bream with shio konbu and truffle oil. Taste the specially concocted truffle oil , Kinki Truffle Oil, in the aromatic Tai Carpaccio. Another crowd favourite is the Hot Dynamite maki of fried salmon, yellowtail roll, scallion and cayenne pepper. Its drinks list is a medley of ‘East meets West’ cocktails and traditional Japanese
liquor built to complement its food and all local and international palates.

The brand’s cheeky, hip and playful attitude permeates from its interiors which includes an attention-grabbing floor mural designed by tattoo artist Christ Garver of Miami Ink fame, to its personable and enthusiastic service and culinary team. With the gorgeous waterfront view, it makes for a good place for business meetings amongst expatriates and office executives working nearby.

As Singapore’s first graffiti art bar, Kinki Rooftop Bar is the epitome of a Tokyo underground scene. Set within an urban landscape with a spectacular view of the Marina Bay waterfront, the bar is filled with edgy graffiti and warm lights to set a hip yet relaxing and unpretentious vibe for friends to hang out. The music is a mix of house and acid jazz and escalates to a thumping hip hop and RnB which brings the crowd up another party notch on Thursday and Friday nights.

The drinks menu runs parallel to its restaurant offerings which includes a ‘East meets West’ cocktails and traditional Japanese liquor, however with an extended list of shots appropriate for a bar. Bar snacks are also offered – a slew of comforting modern Japanese fare which includes the Kinki Style Okonomiyaki and Temaki Bites. With a combination of great music, drinks and bar snacks, head over to Kinki Rooftop bar and be guaranteed that your work week will be made better!

Ideal for a weekend soirée or corporate getaway, Sgyacht and Sevens possess the ultimate luxurious motor yachts for short charters in Singapore to Nongsa Point Marina & Resort, and Montigo Resorts Nongsa within the island of Batam. An impressive 50-footer, Sgyacht is fresh off the drawing boards of the BMW design team. It boasts a luxurious cherry wood salon interior with sleek leather lounges. Its generous aft deck features a roomy lounge that seats 13 adults. And its large cockpit is great for a variety of watersports.

Generous seating in the open salon enhances the overall comfort level. And a face-to-face dinette completes the relaxed living space. The popular design offers two quiet staterooms complemented by two ensuite heads. The tranquil master stateroom includes private sliding-door access to the cockpit for added comfort. This exceptional layout is completed with beautiful handcrafted cherry wood furnishings in a superior high-gloss wood finish. Sgyacht’s interior is all about form and function. As you’ll be hooked up to a massive selection of movies with a 40-inch television. Music can also be played through the fly bridge and interior stereo systems.

Best known for his work in the puppet show, ‘Punch & Judy’, Mr Punch now introduces his latest venture at 26 Seah Street: Mr Punch Public House. Iconic for its walls, which are adorned with vintage enamel and tin signs, the space exudes just the kind of odd familiarity that makes it feel like home to a travelling old-timer. Cozy and intimate, the basement is perfect for casual events and private get-together, while the wild and free can find their home at the rooftop. True to his puppet shows origin, Mr Punch adds showmanship to each event, from his Opening Act table to his Finale display. We provide the inspiration to make your event one that is truly memorable and unique.

Housed on the second storey of a restored conservation shophouse in Tanjong Pagar, Group Therapy Duxton is an intimate and charming space with a loft-like ceiling that affords you the flexibility to host your events in comfort and style.

Yum Cha [Changi] at UE Bizhub East is a chinse restaurant which is suitable for your corporate event like a meeting, presentations, workshops, D&D etc or social event like weddings, birthday, baby shower, Engagement etc.

We are a Mediterranean Restaurant with a menu catered for all lovers of Mediterranean and vegetarian food with a wide selection of wines and beverages. We can accommodate 100 seating capacity of our restaurant, 50 indoor and 50 outdoor. We can cater to 200 guests for a cocktail party, seating and standing included. At night, we have a candlelight ambience indoors and outdoors. We have a nice garden table with a view for smokers. Should the need arises, we are able to display an outdoor bar and a DJ Console.

The restaurant can be booked separately by indoor or outdoor or both spaces together for the event organizer’s flexibility.

Pizzeria Giardino! Was established at Chijmes in 2004, we have re-opened at our new location at CHIJMES under the name Giardino Pizza Bar & Grill. Giardino! Is a casual Italian restaurant, specializing in rustic yet refined Italian food with an authentic flair. We offer classic and artisan pizzas that are hand-crafted and cooked to order in our wood-fired oven, which is visible throughout the restaurant. All our entrees are made from scratch from the highest quality, imported and domestic, ingredients. The ambience and décor has a distinct personality that sets a mood for high-energy fun and entertainment.

Welcome to Wine Universe, where a treasury of wines from all over the world await you!

Located in a corner of Millenia Walk in Singapore, our restaurant glassy exterior with its sidewalk alfresco lounge invites guests to step into its dynamic space incorporating a restaurant, a wine bar and retail-cellar.

Paired with a menu featuring contemporary Swiss cuisine, the food and wines presented enhance each other, elevating guests’ culinary experience to a new level.

www.wine-universe.com.sg

Affectionately known as No.5, this bar has become the favorite “watering hole” for many locals,
expatriates and tourists since 1991. Housed in a 1910 Peranakan shophouse, the old charm and
flavor of the Peranakan are retained with the original wall paint, antique carvings and unpolished
wooden floorboards still intact.

Just minutes away from the busy hub of Orchard Road, the quaintness of Emerald Hill and the
charisma of the architecture provide a warm and cozy ambiance at No.5. Customers will feel
immediately at home when they step into the bar. Serving an impressive range of international
cocktails, mocktails, shooters, long drinks, beers and spirits using premium labels as housepours -
there is no wonder why customers keep coming back to No.5.

Charisma D’Venue is a Halal semi-fine dining restaurant offering a unique gastronomy experience. We offer a delectable range of menu to meet your craving for all kinds of proteins. Charisma D’Venue has developed our own range of cuisine in-house none other than by Chef Fauzie. Besides our Chef recommended Lambshank briyani, we offer a blend of western and local, east meet west dishes that is bound to satisfy your appetite.

Charisma D’Venue sits at an ideal location where you will have a comfortable and serene experience, away from the bustlings of the city area and yet enjoy hotel standard food at AFFORDABLE PRICES. We are uniquely positioned to satisfy those who wish to dine- in for formal lunch meetings to casual night gatherings among family members and friends. Our menu is bound to meet your cravings.

Charisma D’Venue is well suited to cater to your special events. With the ample space, we provide wedding services with complete set up to ensure that your wedding takes place successfully. We can also host corporate luncheons, dinners or other functions where close bond, interaction and hassle-free is your priority.
Charisma D’Venue will continue to ensure that we provide you with the experience, great food, and service that you always wanted.

At Charisma D’Venue, we believe you will love us!

The Polliwogs @ Vivocity Mall offers seriously FUN memories in a safe and hygienic environment. Our adventurous attractions and diverse programs facilitate social interactions between families and encourage the fostering of new friendships. FUN Ambassadors are always ready to organize exciting activities and unforgettable celebrations for that special day in every child and parents’ lives.

Indulge in delicious healthy food and snacks; meet The Polliwogians – Rocky, Larry, Poco and Bobby; throw a themed birthday party; get creative with our weekly activities; and much much more.

Featuring state of the art play equipment, custom built to promote parent-child bonding through multi-sensory play, The Polliwogs = Serious Fun.

Each centre also offers a dedicated play arena for toddlers that encourages the development of fine motor skills, as well as a comfortable lounge area with free wireless network for the adults. The fun never stops at The Polliwogs.

Designed by architects Morrelli & Melvin and built by award winning SA boat builder Robertson & Caine, Mikanna features ground breaking innovations in comfort, safety, and performance. Mikanna represents the next generation of power catamaran luxury yachts, which was designed specifically for your enjoyment.

Mikanna features outdoor and indoor dining areas, a fully equipped galley, spacious saloon, and a cocktail bar off the galley. There are 4 suits with Showers.  The flybridge on top of the main salon comes complete with wrap around seating for 8, a wet bar, BBQ, cooler, and drink holders.

Mikanna is the first yacht in Singapore to have projector screen installed which can be used for presentation or movies.

It is a perfect location to entertain your family, guests or clients for corporate & private events, birthdays, anniversaries or a daily family outing. Mikanna can accommodate comfortably 26 guests.

Owned by Lloyd Marine, this luxurious Lagoon 450 sailing catamaran offers the perfect venue for corporate or private events of up to 27 people. Enjoy sailing, kayaking and paddle-boarding in the sheltered bay of Lazarus Island, or entertain in style on a sunset cruise, with the stunning Singapore skyline as your backdrop.

Located in the up and coming Jalan Besar precinct, iNCOGNiTO is a collaboration with the good folks from Chye Seng Huat Hardware. When the sun sets, the hip coffee bar melds into iNCOGNiTO, a craft beer bar with a twist. iNCOGNiTO is all about craft beers on tap, special releases, rare cellared beers and hearty food with a twist.

The CSHH Coffee Bar features the first 360-degree coffee bar in Singapore, where it highlights the barista’s brewing craft. The bar features espresso-based and single origin coffee. The cold brew coffee is bottled and served with milk and simple syrup on the side. For beer lovers, Papa Palheta has collaborated with local brewers, Jungle Beer, to come up with a coffee beer using Papa Palheta’s signature blend, Terra Firma.

For tummy-fillers, the bar features pairings of coffee and our baked goods. The kitchen serves sandwiches, patties, pancakes and a meat platter.

A 1950s, early 60s event space tucked away in e east (Tanjong Katong). The venue is a double storey gallery that’s designed aesthetically to reflect the art-decor era but with modern comfort and amenities.

The curated space is available for rental for events, functions, parties, launches, intimate dinners and photoshoots.

The Beast has 2 levels which can be used for private events, networking, product launches, birthday parties and more.

Opened late last year by nightlife entrepreneur Jamie Koh, The Beast boasts a unique Southern American style kitchen and Singapore’s first and only bourbon bar. They have an impressive stock of over 30 bourbon whiskeys and also have their homemade liqueur stored in oak-barrels.

Brought up in a family of successful restaurateurs in his hometown in the south of Italy, owner and chef Toni Rossetti brings to his very own restaurant – NOTI Restaurant & Bar, a taste of home, tradition and warmth of authentic Italian food from cherished family recipes and the flavours from this bountiful region. In a contemporary interior that exudes a trendy vibe, Toni and his team provide the guests with the consummate dining experience of good food and great hospitality that has become the signature of Noti restaurant and bar.

A chic and laidback dining spot along One Fullerton overlooking a spectacular view of the Marina Bay waterfront, The Pelican serves luxurious yet comforting East Coast American cuisine grounded in the freshest seafood prepped skillfully by its culinary team. Dishes are inspired by the notion of homecoming celebrations and are created for sharing. These include seafood platters, boils and raw bar options. The drinks menu includes classic cocktails with a twist alongside an extensive list of wines.

The interiors of the indoor restaurant are lavish with large comfortable leather booths, elegant black and white marble flooring and an eclectic mix of vintage items. At the outdoor Pelican Deck, guests can enjoy the breeze and sunset while enjoying regular oyster deals alongside DJ beats focused on popular funky house, RnB and Hip Hop tracks.

The Pelican Indoor Restaurant: Private Dining Area; seats 20 pax
The Pelican Indoor Restaurant: Exclusive; seats 55 pax 
The Pelican Deck (Outdoor): Seats 110 pax, standing 150 pax

Alfresco dining at BistroBar is exceptional cuisine in a stylishly laid-back environment. A contemporary European menu offers lovingly prepared dishes. Enjoy a surprising set lunch, drop by for our Sunday brunch, or unwind over fresh signature cocktails. This combination of culinary delights, heavenly drinks and breezy-ambience also makes BistroBar the ideal location for a memorable event.

Deck is a Groundbreaking Art Space & Unique Event Space launched with the mission to support and nurture the community of photography enthusiasts in Singapore and Southeast Asia. It houses a Gallery, Resource Library, Activity Studio, Artist’s Studio and Café within 19 magnificent shipping containers, creatively assembled to overcome the challenge of land scarcity in our small city.

It is an art connector between two art institutions in the Bras Basah District, and offers an accessible venue for people to celebrate photography right in the city centre of Singapore.

Perfect event venue for product launches, fashion shows, corporate celebrations, roadshows and fund raising activities.

“There is always room for cake.”

Butter Studio is a homegrown artisan bakery dedicated to honor the craft of home baking while infusing a playful spin on familiar comforting bakes. Handcrafted fresh daily with fine quality ingredients, signature favorites include the Salted Caramel Red Velvet cake, Speculoos Ondeh cake and Sea Salt Nutella tart.

Favorably located at the city fringe (just outside of Singapore’s Central Business District) and nestled in the charming, eclectic Jalan Besar neighbourhood, Butter Studio is a cosy respite from the urban hustle and bustle.

Housed in a heritage conservation shophouse and the homely, rustic furnishings within the store create a relaxed and comforting ambience. It’s a perfect venue for birthday celebrations, family gatherings, engagement parties, team meetings and corporate functions.

As a versatile unique space, it is also suitable for conducting workshops, masterclasses and seminars for team bonding sessions. 
*thematic dessert tables available

The in-house event team can work with you to decorate the space and configure layout to facilitate your event.
*team bonding activities available

3mins walking distance from Jalan Besar MRT station (exit B) 
Located along the main Jalan Besar road 
Multi-storey carpark available behind the store

Ristorante Pietrasanta is a dining outlet which embraces the concept of a Family Restaurant in Tuscany Style. Our focus is to delight every customer with an authentic Tuscan dining experience. Served in a comfortable and home-like Italian environment, the restaurant is an ideal getaway from the hustle and bustle of city life, especially for those who want to relax and chill out in a cosy place. Culture and gastronomy have always been in the heart of the family which hails from the artistic town of Pietrasanta in Tuscany. This space can host up to 120 standing or 80 sitting event.
Casa Pietrasanta - the private dining room, is designed to cater for groups to enjoy private dining experience at a warm and cosy venue. It is an ideal location to host your special event. Equipped with a private kitchen and wine cellar, our team of accommodating chef and staff welcomes you to experience a special and memorable time. This exclusive space can take up to 60 standing or 34 sitting event.

MINT Museum of Toy’s contemporary building, located in Singapore’s Civic District, offers unique spaces to host both corporate & private events. With 4 thematic levels, the museum showcases an extensive collection of rare and unique vintage toys from the 1840s - 1980s; think ray guns, Batman and teddy bears. The unique decor offers a one-of-a-kind experience that will inspire nostalgia and the child in everyone of us.

Hungry Heroes is the first superhero theme cafe and restaurant in Singapore. Amassed over the last 25 years, Hungry Heroes displays countless original and licensed superhero memorabilia from Marvel & other comics, including life-sized statues, head busts, figurines and movie posters. This restaurant and bar specialising in hearty meats and American delights. From the nuclear-powered kitchen, specialty meat is the name of the game and share-worthy platters of tender cuts are the superpowers of Hungry Heroes.

Located in a surprisingly quaint part of Little India, Hungry Heroes is housed in a charming and nostalgic conservational shophouse. The gorgeously quirky interior space makes it an excellent venue for fun and intimate events. Provide an enjoyable experience for your guests with hearty grilled meats paired with tasty craft beers.

Kombi Rocks Diner is the new name and look, since 2012, of Koon Kee Restaurant circa 1971. Our menu today preserves the Teochew-Thai fusion dishes that Koon Kee Restaurant served since 1971. These dishes are our parents legacy and our heirtage. We hope you enjoy them as much as we did.

Our name is derived from one of the most iconic vehicles ever built – the Kombi, which we love and have collected a number of. To us, every vehicle is a time machine. We imagine that we are transported back in time when we travel in the fleet. For those who want to relive this experience, we can hold up to 80pax for a cocktail event, 60 seated, and just for 2 indulgently in the privacy of a parked 60 years old VW Kombi…

Learning Studios @ Lifelong Learning Academy, the ideal venue for all sorts of training, meetings and seminars.

With flexible partitioning of each room, we would cater to various group sizes. Each partition have been sound proof, leaving distraction or eavesdropping during your session with us the last worry on your mind. Equipped with a state of the art projector and audio system, your presentation would be a walkover with your message effectively conveyed to your attendees.

Strategically located beside MacPherson MRT station coupled with bus stop a short walk away, accessibility would no longer for be a hassle for your attendees.

This is not your average cinema, The Projector is a genuine alternative to the conventional cineplex. Our unique space has been adaptively reused to facilitate a wide range of activities and events beyond traditional movie screenings.

The Projector resides in an oft overlooked piece of local architecture - Golden Mile Tower, a modernist architectural icon of early Singapore. The space calls subtle attention to the past glory of a beloved old cinema. Special elements of the space harken back to its past: vintage signage, original flip-up theatre seats with wooden armrests, fabric walls, and floor lettering denoting the rows of seats have all been retained.

With a classic cinema hall, an experimental cinema and entertainment space with extended stage, and a sunlit cafe foyer with panoramic city views, The Projector is an ideal setting for a range of traditional or one-of-a-kind events.

Either or both of our halls (left, right) are available for hire, each include use of the Cafe reception/lobby area (below right) for additional space and programming needs. Each hall has been updated and redesigned to facilitate a range of events types. The space is easily accessible via direct elevator from the ground floor.
Venue packages start from $2,500 based on 4-hour block slots

As the only establishment atop the SuperTree Grove, SuperTree by IndoChine is situated perfectly on the tallest structure, so guests will be able to sip martinis and enjoy intimate dinners under the starlit skies. With premium location, views and first-rate services, Supertree by Indochine is your perfect venue for hosting corporate events, product launches and weddings for up to 400 people.

The Space: You’ll be spoilt for choice. Pick from a laid back, airy restaurant space with an extra loft level for extra privacy, large enough to fit a band! Or, chill at the rooftop with a breathtaking view of the Singapore skyline, complete with pool, sauna, basketball court, and futsal pitch! Can’t decide? Do both! Rumble on the rooftop, before heading down to refuel at the restaurant,

The Food: Oven or Wok? You decide. Our special Bertha ovens are imported from the UK. Bertha cooks everything on intense charcoal and fiery heat, ensuring the smoky taste of fire in all your meats, seafood and even dessert.  We can fire up the wok as well, to bring you the best Singaporean comfort food with that wonderful wok hei taste.
